trans-unit.source: Represents a data-binding converter to handle the visibility of repeat buttons in scrolling menus.
trans-unit.target: Representerer et konverteringsprogram for databinding til å håndtere synligheten for Gjenta knappene rulling menyer.

trans-unit.source: The MenuScrollingVisibilityConverter determines whether a menu should display the repeat buttons when a menu has too many items to fit on the screen at once.
trans-unit.target: MenuScrollingVisibilityConverter bestemmer om en meny skal vise Gjenta knappene når en meny har for mange elementer du vil få plass på skjermen samtidig.

trans-unit.source: Use the converter with a <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> that has four bindings.
trans-unit.target: Bruk konverteringsprogram med en <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>som har fire bindinger.</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding>

trans-unit.source: The four bindings should be to properties of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>: If the menu items are organized vertically (which is the default for menus), bind to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedVerticalScrollBarVisibility%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Fire bindingene skal egenskapene til overordnet <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>: Hvis menyelementene er ordnet loddrett (som standard for menyene), bindes til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedVerticalScrollBarVisibility%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedVerticalScrollBarVisibility%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: If the menu items are organized horizontally, bind to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedHorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis menyelementene er ordnet vannrett, bindes til <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedHorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedHorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding.ConverterParameter%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to 0 or 100.
trans-unit.target: Angi <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding.ConverterParameter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>til 0 eller 100.</xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding.ConverterParameter%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The value is treated as a percentage and determines whether a button is hidden when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is at the given location.
trans-unit.target: Verdien behandles som en prosentdel og bestemmer om en knapp er skjult når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>er på den angitte plasseringen.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is at the top, the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is 0% and the top button is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>er øverst, posisjonen for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>er 0% og den øverste knappen er skjult.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is at the bottom, the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is 100% and the bottom button is hidden.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>er nederst posisjonen for den <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>100% og nederste-knappen er skjult.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuScrollingVisibilityConverter"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.MenuScrollingVisibilityConverter"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Called when moving a value from a source to a target.
trans-unit.target: Kalles når du flytter en verdi fra en kilde til et mål.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue> may be returned to indicate that the converter produced no value and that the default value should be used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>kan returneres for å angi at konverteringen gav ingen verdi, og at standardverdien skal brukes.</xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing> may be returned to indicate that the binding should not transfer the value or use the default value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing>kan returneres for å angi at bindingen ikke skal overføre verdien eller bruk standardverdien.</xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing>

trans-unit.source: Values produced by the source binding.
trans-unit.target: Verdier fra kildebinding.

trans-unit.source: Type of the target.
trans-unit.target: Typen for målet.

trans-unit.source: Type that the source will be converted into.
trans-unit.target: Typen som kilden blir konvertert til.

trans-unit.source: Converter parameter.
trans-unit.target: Konverteringsprogram parameter.

trans-unit.source: Culture information.
trans-unit.target: Kulturinformasjon.

trans-unit.source: Converted value.
trans-unit.target: Konvertert verdi.

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: Støttes ikke.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren brukes ikke.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren brukes ikke.

trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren brukes ikke.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: Denne parameteren brukes ikke.
